\begingroup
\lccode`\'=`\'
\input pattern-loader.tex
\ifNativeUtfEightPatterns
	\input hyph-la.tex
\else
\t% we still load old patterns for 8-bit TeX
	\input lahyph.tex
\fi
\endgroup
